name: Jonah Ray
bio: Originally from Oahu, Jonah has been doing comedy in Los Angeles since 2002. Currently he is about to start production on the third season of Comedy Central's THE MELTDOWN WITH JONAH AND KUMAIL, and right after that he'll be shooting the new season of MYSTERY SCIENCE THEATER: 3000. Currently you can see Jonah's new show HIDDEN AMERICA on SEESO.
